reviewText: Since I first started watching any of his films, it didn't matter what kind of movie it would be, I was just so captivated. Not only does Denzel do a great job acting, but he makes you believe he's that person in real life. From making him want to love/hate him as a crooked cop in 'Training Day' to making you empathize as a parent in desperate need in 'John Q' these films are well worth the purchase!
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Denzel Washington (Fallen, John Q, The Pelican Brief, Training Day)

reviewText: I love getting these great movie deals.  You get four movies at the price of one.  Each movie is on it's own disc.  I am very pleased with this product and good deal.  Thanks to amazon for the great prices and great deals.  I would recommend this.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Denzel Washington (Fallen, John Q, The Pelican Brief, Training Day)

reviewText: All 4 films are very good and interesting. I don't think a Denzel Washington fan would be bored with this DVD.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Denzel Washington (Fallen, John Q, The Pelican Brief, Training Day)

reviewText: Received and was very pleased.  Had to clean one of the DVDs. I did not like the idea that the DVDs were stacked ontop of each other. But everything went ok.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Denzel Washington (Fallen, John Q, The Pelican Brief, Training Day)

reviewText: Denzel Washington is certainly one of the best! His movies leave me thinking about other angles and perspectives in the drama of life. Excellent!
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Denzel Washington (Fallen, John Q, The Pelican Brief, Training Day)

reviewText: I have always been a Denzel Washington fan and my goal is to own all of his films. What a goos option: to get 4 movies at once! I have a lot of these 4 film collections (besides his) and the price is great!
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Denzel Washington (Fallen, John Q, The Pelican Brief, Training Day)

reviewText: Truly an excellent purchase, as you get 4 DVD movies for a really good price. Denzel Washington just doesn't make a bad movie. "Fallen" was totally unexpected. A very odd premise, but very worth watching until the end. "Training Day" was really full of twists and turns and the plot was incredibly complicated. When you finally understand what has happened, you realize how much you missed by watching it only one time. The other 2 were great acting on his part. He just is one of our finest actors.  The DVD was sent quickly and arrived in excellent condition.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Denzel Washington (Fallen, John Q, The Pelican Brief, Training Day)

reviewText: I don't think that I have ever seen a movie that Denzel Washington has made that isn't great.  I have been getting this compilations for our library of movies.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Denzel Washington (Fallen, John Q, The Pelican Brief, Training Day)

reviewText: Great way to get four movies for a very low price.  Buying used is even better and I've never received a bad deal.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Denzel Washington (Fallen, John Q, The Pelican Brief, Training Day)

reviewText: John Q and The Pelican Brief were great, the other 2, passable, Denzel is a great actor, enjoy him in most movies.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Denzel Washington (Fallen, John Q, The Pelican Brief, Training Day)

reviewText: I am a big fan of Denzel Washington. He was electrifying as as an investigative reporter. The movie was believable and well thought out. Julie Roberts was brilliant in her portrayal as a college student. She could play any movie roll with poise and is a wonderful actress.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Denzel Washington (Fallen, John Q, The Pelican Brief, Training Day)

reviewText: I am building a Denzel Washington collection. Denzel showed signs of his potential in the medical Tv series classic St, Elsewhere. The opportunity to get 4 of his movies for the price of 1.
summary: Denzel Washington one of the GREAT ACTORS of our time!
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Denzel Washington (Fallen, John Q, The Pelican Brief, Training Day)

reviewText: John Q. and the Pelican Brief are great movies and these two alone make this a good deal.  However, the other two just took up my time. In each case, the movie started out great and looked to be well worth watching.  But in each case (Training Day and Fallen) the film changed  gears the last half hour and absolutely ruined what otherwise would have been a good flick.
Title: 4 Film Favorites: Denzel Washington (Fallen, John Q, The Pelican Brief, Training Day)
